projects.title: Modern Apartment in Mumbai
projects.metaTitle: Modern Apartment Interior Design Mumbai | Sharma Space Portfolio
projects.metaDescription: Sleek minimalist apartment design in Mumbai by Bangalore's Sharma Space. View our modern residential interior design portfolio.
projects.description: A sleek, minimalist design with neutral tones and contemporary furnishings. This project transformed a standard apartment into a sophisticated living space with clean lines and thoughtful touches throughout. The design emphasizes functionality without sacrificing elegance, creating a perfect balance for modern urban living.

image.alt: Modern apartment interior design Mumbai minimalist living room

coverImage.alt: Modern apartment interior design Mumbai hero image

challenges: Limited natural light in living areas
Compact space requiring smart storage solutions
solutions: Strategic mirror placement to amplify natural light
Neutral color palette with selective accent pieces

testimonial.text: Sharma Space transformed our apartment beyond our expectations. The minimalist design perfectly suits our lifestyle.
testimonial.author: Mr. Sharma

projects.title: Co-Working Space in Whitefield
projects.metaTitle: Co-Working Space Interior Design Whitefield Bangalore | Sharma Space
projects.metaDescription: Modern co-working space design in Whitefield by Bangalore's leading interior designers. Commercial interior design portfolio.
projects.description: A vibrant, collaborative workspace designed for productivity and creativity. This modern facility provides a dynamic environment for professionals from various fields in Bangalore's tech hub.

image.alt: Co-working space interior design Whitefield Bangalore modern office

coverImage.alt: Co-working space Whitefield Bangalore commercial interior design

challenges: Creating distinct zones for different work styles
Ensuring acoustic privacy in open layout
solutions: Flexible furniture systems for adaptable spaces

testimonial.text: The space perfectly captures our company culture and has significantly improved team collaboration.
testimonial.author: TechHub Innovations CEO
